mention.text: lima , 21 mar 90 -- the peruvian navy today

a report -- which was later picked up by a newspaper -- tacitly suggesting that the communist tupac amaru revolutionary movement and prominent people in the peruvian government , including president alan garcia , were involved in the alleged plot
the document , the authenticity of which has been officially denied by the navy
alvaro vargas llosa , a son and spokesman for the peruvian writer
a son and spokesman for the peruvian writer
